TopicTitle: Fractured space is currently free for grab on steam

Articles.Content:
For anyone who is interested, you can grab Fractured space for free on steam during the weekend: [http://store.steampowered.com/app/310380/](http://store.steampowered.com/app/310380/)

This is not a free-to-play weekend, you get to keep the game for good.

Well, a moba needs SOME depth. For example, the combat right now is monotonous and boring, it's just "who has more ships wins". Also capturing bases gives you nothing apart from getting closer to victory.

> 
> Well, a moba needs SOME depth. For example, the combat right now is monotonous and boring, it's just "who has more ships wins". Also capturing bases gives you nothing apart from getting closer to victory.

Combat is actually quite tactical though, as long as you are not like, 1 against 5. Team combat and positioning can do wonders. For example, I was a flagship that specialized in tanking going with a corvette repair ship against 3 others, 1 long range sniper, 1 mid range artillery destroyer and another flagship.

I had to duck behind asteroids and rocks to approach the sniper out of her view, then blast her from the side - the sniper only has a huge front rail gun and is horrible when being attacked anywhere else than the front, but she is watched by the artillery destroyer. So I have to soak up the damage and kill her, before rushing to the destroyer with afterburner, while the corvette heal me from behind. The covette then disable the destroyer's ability, so she can't deploy bombers and missiles to wreck me from afar. I then position myself behind the destroyer where only 1 of the cannon can point at me, and release my barrage of flak cannon. The enemy flagship noticed me killing her teammates and return, but she was unable to stun me with flagship ability since the covette disable her again, while I stun the flagship instead, and fly right under her belly. The flagship has heavy armor almost everywhere, except for an area near the engine where coolants and radiators are exposed - in flagship vs flagship combat, whoever is lower win, since the top one can only hit the reinforced armor, while the one below can hit the exposed spot. So I flak that area away, dealing extra damage and hamper her engine's performance, and cause her to go boom. 2v3 wins!
